channel.title: Massive SCAR Learning Package v2 07-19-2006 updated
channel.description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Note:[/b] There is a newer package released.. It's [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,121451.0.html]HERE[/url] (stickified in SCAR Scripting Help section). Name has changed, though. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ello people.
I've compiled once again a massive package, of SCAR things.
This package really is MASSIVE [as the name already tells](it's 812MB when extracted, and 390MB packed), so people with bad computers, do not download this. It's too big. ;-)
I have made already couple topics about the packages, and comments ... Well haven't got that many comments of the downloads. So I decided to not make a huge explanation about the package.
Shortly:
It's really good package to learn basically (almost) anything that you could/can do with SCAR. It's also good package to learn how to use SCAR. The package is mostly for new scripters, but it also has stuff for advanced scripters, too. :)
People who love to collect things.. Will love this one.
HERE IS THE LINKS(pick up one): [url=http://www.yousendit.com/transfer.php?action=download&ufid=15F9A8AB351BA61A]yousendit[/url] [url=http://www.gigagone.com/view/1182/Massive_SCAR_Learning_Package_v2.zip]gigagone[/url] [url=http://www.sexuploader.com/?d=8HHO7QGR]sexuploader[/url] or [url=http://www.sexuploader.com/?d=K9OY4NP1]sexuploader2[/url] [url=http://www.mooload.com/new/file.php?file=files/210706/1153470753/Massive+SCAR+Learning+Package+v2.zip]mooload[/url]
sexuploader is alot like megaupload, oh btw. Even better :D (download speed)
Get the package when you still can.. Will be uploaded in YouSendIt for 7 days. I will add mirrors in couple days, though. :)
Good luck.. + Have fun. ;) Comments about it are welcome, by the way.
-Janilabo
Edit: this is now then v2. It has some stuff added, some deleted (duplicates) and it also has some things fixed + CREDITS document updated. It is bigger than v1 was by couple MEGS :P <3

item.title: Massive SCAR Learning Package v2 07-19-2006 updated
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

Hours? No no, we are talking about years here…

There is stuff inside collected since year 2004 (That’s when I came around, though I only cheated in RuneScape for 1 month, as my RSC macroer got banned after month, because of botting)…

…from communities like:
-ReiNet
-RSCheatNet
-Kaitnieks
-RuneCMS
-Sythe
-Rs Tools
-Saradomin
-Moparisthebest
-SRL-Forums
-Cruels
-Fagex
-JAGHaX
-SCAR-Scripts
-RS-Resources
-RS2Cheating
-Dingo
-SCARForum
-ImpSoft
-RuneRS

So yeah, there are alot stuff that wouldn’t probably exist anymore (many sites has gone down past 3 years, with em lots of resources for SCAR, I saved most of em)…

But that is actually the collecting part only, there is also: scanning (with Jotti/VirusTotal), checking (looking through each thing), organizing, compiling and then finally the uploading parts. I did all really carefully/patiently, just to save only safe and useful things in it. Those took weeks. There is also alot stuff made by me in it (couple tutorials, some scripts, few examples, functions/procedures & some small GIFs)…

Read full topic
item.source: Massive SCAR Learning Package v2 07-19-2006 updated

item.title: Massive SCAR Learning Package v2 07-19-2006 updated
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

nicodk, I already updated new version of package Here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,121451.msg1190172.html#new (Moparisthebest link) or http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/massive-package-resources-t10041.html (SRL-Forums link)

I removed alot of unneeded stuff from it and then added in stuff that might become quite useful for script development… Plus I compensated tutorials, that were WordPart Documents (.rtf), with 1 HTML Help File (.chm), just to save some space (WordPad Documents took around 300 MB, the HTML Help File takes 15. :P). Oh, and I organized the package this time pretty damn well (compared to older packages).

Read full topic

item.title: Massive SCAR Learning Package v2 07-19-2006 updated
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

[quote=“sidishere, post:63, topic:5140”][quote author=Bebemycat2 link=topic=6723.msg887227#msg887227 date=1171192561]

Can someone post virus scan results please? dont have time to upload it myself…

I assure you it is clean.
I have downloaded myself, and Janilabo is a respectable person.
[/quote]
when i scanned it with bitdefender it came up with a virus but im not sure if it is. plus i couldnt delete the virus becos it froze so can someone scan it?[/quote]The only thing I could think of popping up anykind of warnings, is the SCAR v1.13 uninstaller. But that is something I can’t do anything about (–> I don’t want to remove it, as it is one of the older versions and also, it was in use for a looong time). It was back then downloaded from poonscape.com (which was Official Download Site those days :)), that was hosted by Dylock and the SCAR 1.13 was made by Kaitnieks himself. What the SCAR v1.13 uninstaller does have, is ADware… If you are worried about it, delete the uninstaller.

And to Bebemycat2, thanks for those kind words.

Edit: dudeofthed, if you can’t open .CHM files, I think you’ll need HTML Help Workshop… Click HERE.
…and yeah, it should open it without problems, at least if you have Windows 2000/Windows 2003/Windows XP/etc…

Read full topic
